predicate.note: Frames file for 'spell' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison to 'mean'.

roleset.name: mean

example.name: intact arg1
example.text: The withdrawals could spell trouble for the $200 billion junk market.
example.arg: trouble for the $200 billion junk market

example.name: split arg1
example.text: Compaq's announcement also spells trouble for Zenith, which last year had 28% of the U.S. laptop market...
example.arg: for Zenith, which last year had 28% of the U.S. laptop market

roleset.note: Treebank is inconsistent about the placement of the "for" clause. Please always include it in the arg1.

example.name: in tedious detail
example.text: The 1988 tax act created a federal bill of rights spelling out IRS duties to protect taxpayers' rights in the assessment and collection of taxes.
example.arg: IRS duties to protect taxpayers' rights in the assessment and collection of taxes
